Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Reservation

  • public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the reservation at the restaurant
    Author:
    Lexx Audrey Pecson Manalansan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reservation(java.lang.String custName, int custContact, int numOfPax, java.util.Calendar reservationTime, Table tableReservation)
      make a new reservation that includes customer's name, customer's contact number, number of people arriving, reservation start time, and reserved table

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(java.lang.String custName,
                   int custContact,
                   int numOfPax,
                   java.util.Calendar reservationTime,
                   Table tableReservation)
        make a new reservation that includes customer's name, customer's contact number, number of people arriving, reservation start time, and reserved table
        Parameters:
        custName - Name of the customer who booked the reservation
        custContact - Contact number of the customer
        numPax - Number of people attending the reservation
        reservationTime - Start time of the reservation
        reservedTable - Table booked for the reservation
